scripts.setup-env: cd frontend/super-admin-web && cp .env.example .env && cd ../admin-web && cp .env.example .env && cd ../tea-boy-web && cp .env.example .env && cd ../meeting-room-web && cp .env.example .env
scripts.build-all: npm run build-super-admin && npm run build-admin && npm run build-tea-boy && npm run build-meeting-room
scripts.build-super-admin: cd frontend/super-admin-web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-admin: cd frontend/admin-web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-tea-boy: cd frontend/tea-boy-web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-meeting-room: cd frontend/meeting-room-web && npm install && npm run build
